name: Jobs
author: Cascade AI
description: A list of common jobs and professions.

words.hint: A person who is qualified to treat people who are ill.
A person who helps students to acquire knowledge, competence, or virtue.
A person who designs, builds, or maintains engines, machines, or structures.
A person who creates art, such as paintings or sculptures, as a profession.
A person who practices or studies law; an attorney or a counselor.
A professional cook, typically the chief cook in a restaurant or hotel.
A person who operates the flying controls of an aircraft.
A person whose job is to extinguish fires.
A person trained to care for the sick or infirm, especially in a hospital.
A person who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences.
A person who is a member of a police force and responsible for enforcing the law.
A person qualified to treat the diseases and conditions that affect the teeth and gums.
A person who owns or manages a farm.
A person who writes books, stories, or articles as a job or regular occupation.
A person qualified to treat diseased or injured animals.
A person who repairs and maintains machinery, motors, etc.
A person who takes photographs, especially as a job.
A person whose profession is acting on the stage, in movies, or on television.
A person who cuts and styles hair as an occupation.
A person in charge of or assisting in a library.
